reservations.name: Hilton Sydney
reservations.description: A modern hotel located in the heart of Sydney, offering luxurious accommodations and amenities.
reservations.name: Seaside Bliss Hotel
reservations.description: A beachfront hotel with stunning ocean views and modern amenities.

transportation.name: Round Trip Flight from Tampa to Sydney
transportation.description: Round trip flight with a major airline, taking approximately 22 hours with a layover.
transportation.name: Local Car Rental
transportation.description: Convenient car rental service near the hotel for exploring the area.

vacation.climate: April in Australia features mild weather, with temperatures ranging from 55°F to 75°F (13°C to 24°C).

day1.day_description: Arrive in Sydney and explore the iconic Sydney Opera House and nearby Royal Botanic Garden.

activities.title: Sydney Opera House Restaurant
activities.description: Enjoy a meal with a stunning view of the Sydney Harbour.

activities.title: Sydney Opera House Tour
activities.description: A guided tour exploring the architecture and history of the Opera House.
activities.climate: Mild and sunny, with temperatures ranging from 60°F to 75°F

day1.day_description: Explore the Santa Monica Pier and local shops.

activities.title: Santa Monica Pier
activities.description: A fun amusement park and historic landmark by the beach.

activities.title: The Lobster
activities.description: Seafood restaurant offering ocean views and fresh seafood dishes.

activities.title: Bike Rental
activities.description: Rent a bike to ride along the beach and explore the boardwalk.

activities.title: Beaches Coffee Shop
activities.description: A casual coffee shop serving snacks and beverages near the beach.

day2.day_description: Experience Sydney's local culture with a visit to The Rocks and enjoy a harbor cruise.

activities.title: The Rocks Markets
activities.description: Explore local food stalls offering a variety of cuisines.

activities.title: Sydney Harbour Cruise
activities.description: Take a scenic cruise around Sydney Harbour and see the city from the water.
activities.day_description: Visit Venice Beach and relax on the sand.

activities.title: Venice Beach Boardwalk
activities.description: Famous for its lively atmosphere and street performers.

activities.title: Café Buna
activities.description: A beachfront café known for its organic coffee and hearty breakfast.

activities.title: Muscle Beach Gym
activities.description: An iconic outdoor gym where you can work out or watch bodybuilders.

activities.title: The Sidewalk Café
activities.description: Casual eatery with outdoor seating and a relaxed vibe.
